note: Sybo Games' catalog is highly focused on the 'Subway Surfers' franchise. All primary titles are Free-to-Play with extensive In-App Purchases and Ads.

gamekit_integration.achievements: Yes (Integrated with Apple Game Center Achievements)

content_description.violence: Infrequent/Mild Cartoon or Fantasy Violence (The game's theme revolves around 'running away' from an inspector, but injuries are mild/cartoonish).
content_description.other_content_warnings: Infrequent/Mild Profanity or Crude Humor (Rarely mentioned, but a general 9+ classification allows for it). The theme also involves 'illegal activity' (running on train tracks, graffiti), which is covered by the 9+ rating.

content_description.violence: Infrequent/Mild Cartoon or Fantasy Violence (Fantasy combat against cartoonish enemies with no blood or gore).
